title: Configure room
error: An error occurred trying to fetch the room information. Try again by refreshing the page.
field-link-hint: Share this link with the people in the videocall.
field-bingo-spinner-hint: If you have a bingo spinner and want to use it, uncheck this option.

players.title: People who is going to play:
players.field-admin-hint: Choose the person who'll be in charge of selecting the numbers in the bingo spinner so other players get notified.
